description: Dive into the world of AI-driven design with highlights on Bolt.new's rapid website generation, Shopify Horizon's flexible theme framework, and advanced SVG SMIL animations. joke: Why did the web developer go broke? Because they kept rendering themselves useless.
challenge: Challenge: Create an interactive web experience featuring animated blobs. Utilize HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to design blobs that change shape, color, and position based on user interaction. Enhance the experience with synchronized audio effects or background animations, leveraging the Canvas API or CSS animations for a dynamic and engaging visual display.
